name: Elasticsearch
description: Search and analytics engine for log analysis and security monitoring
setup_steps: 1. Create an API key in Kibana → Stack Management → API Keys
2. Restrict the key to read-only on security indices
4. Requires Elasticsearch 9.2+ for Agent Builder MCP
security_notes: Use index-level permissions — restrict to security indices only
API keys should be read-only with limited lifetime
Monitor API key usage via Elasticsearch audit logging
